phase.name: Movable Walls and Multi-Asset Artworks
phase.goal: Enable movement of specific walls and allow grouping multiple assets into a single logical artwork with shared metadata.

in.item: Two movable wall meshes from the Satellit GLB
Selection and transform editing of walls in planner
Grouping multiple ArtworkInstances into a single Artwork (multi-asset works)

out.item: No complex branching/merging based on wall states beyond existing versioning logic

frontend.item: Expose movable walls as selectable objects with TransformControls in planner.
Persist wall transforms as part of ExhibitionVersion state.
Allow multi-selection of ArtworkInstances and "group into artwork" actions that share Artwork-level metadata.

backend.item: Extend version persistence to include wall transform data.
Support multiple Assets per Artwork and proper linkage from ArtworkInstance to Asset and Artwork.

successCriteria.item: Curators can reposition the two specified walls while respecting constraints.
Curators can group two or more image instances into one artwork with shared title and text.
